name: GoldenMiner
description:
This is a puzzle game. In this game, gold coins can be obtained through "mining".

There are countless treasures buried underground, and hardworking miners can control the angle of the mining shovel to excavate gold, gemstones, and other strange treasures. Be careful not to let the shovel touch large stones, as the treasures that can be extracted from large stones are rare and difficult to dig. Dear miners, please wave your shovel and discover the treasures together, you may find unexpected surprises!

1. Exquisite game graphics, with characters treated with cuteness

2. Click on the screen to release claws and grab various minerals, which can be exchanged for gold coins

3. Nice and visually appealing game sound effects

4. Attractive high-definition image quality, reinterpreting classic casual game works
